long_description: You'll always have a soft place to set your head with the REI self-inflating travel pillow. Pillow inflates quickly, providing excellent comfort while traveling aboard planes, trains and automobiles. Rolls up small for easy packing in the included storage stuff sack. Stretch-knit polyester fabric is soft and comfortable next to skin. Silicone striping on back reduces shifting of the pillow during use.
short_description: You'll always have a soft place to set your head with the REI self-inflating travel pillow.
